Articles.Content:
What\'s your nick (one which you use usually)?

If you play the game.

Mine: Grove.
'DayOne' I think. Haven\'t played that game in a while.

Luigibro.

I told you about this, didn\'t I? C:
Randy. Just Randy. I tend to play on a German server called fCraft.net.

cardgame

I always play on Sham\'s Little Pony server when I do play, which is very sporadic and rare.
Altair1371, but I keep getting the 'error: server connection failed' error.
We should make our own Kerbal server.

We should make our own Kerbal server.

I total agreed with you.
I had no idea what you were talking about, so I looked it up. Not bad.

Went on the website and read the requirements:

'Your grandmotherâ€™s rig can run this game'

That line there sold it.

Ok, this game is awesome. Set up a server if anyone wants to join. It\'s called Kerbal Space Program.

For the minutes I have played AoS, it\'s been awesome.

However I have a problem with the game and have had since the early development, which when I ask on the forum for the game I just get ignored, as do all the other people with the issue:

It started with the early versions when I would join a game and any time from 1-10 minutes later I would get a freeze, sometimes with the message \'error: server disconnect or kick: also check latest game version.\'

At some point in my many desperate updatings and uninstallations every time the game was updated, the error stopped appearing, but the game still freezes and CTDs every 30s - 5 minutes.

The worst part is, this game is just perfect for me. Minecraft with guns. And no stupid perks crap or SOFLAMs! Can anyone please help me with this bug? (desperately hopes someone has had the same problem) D:
I have that too. But it only affects me after long periods of time.

Well I think one time I played for about half an hour, max... back in very early Alpha. But you\'re lucky. As I said, I get it constantly. The game is unplayable.

What\'s hilarious is that my Acer Aspire One can\'t handle Minecraft on everything lowest, but it runs AoS infinitely better than on my Win7 PC. I\'d say running at all compared to not running is infinitely better, right?

Oh yes, I play it. I\'m Misterspork. I\'ve only had it for a week, played about 2 hours with some other KSP players. My server choice is sporadic, often based off current map. I usually stay near the top though.

Just keep in mind, I get a lot of flak for being pretty good. I am often called a 'hacker' or 'cheater' and get attempted votekicks even though I despise anyone who even thinks of cheating on a multiplayer game. So just note that playing with me might be a short round .
I\'m pretty good myself... or at least I used to be... we should have a face-off sometime.

I\'m pretty good myself... or at least I used to be... we should have a face-off sometime.

Perhaps.
